text: Rukhotyn (; ) is a commune (selsoviet) in Khotyn Raion, Chernivtsi Oblast, Ukraine. It is composed of four villages: Blyshchad (Блищадь; Blișciadi), Hrynyachka (Гринячка; Grineacica), Korneshty (Корнешти; Cornești) and Rukhotyn. Category:Villages in Khotyn Raion Category:Khotinsky Uyezd
title: Rukhotyn
